an4.101:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
an4.101:2.8: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, cattaro valahakupama puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmim.
an4.101:3.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo gajjita hoti no vassita?
an4.101:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo bhasita hoti, no katta.
an4.101:3.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo gajjita hoti, no vassita.
an4.101:3.4: Seyyathapi so, bhikkhave, valahako gajjita, no vassita;
an4.101:4.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo vassita hoti, no gajjita?
an4.101:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo katta hoti, no bhasita.
an4.101:4.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo vassita hoti, no gajjita.
an4.101:4.4: Seyyathapi so, bhikkhave, valahako vassita, no gajjita;
an4.101:5.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo neva gajjita hoti, no vassita?
an4.101:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo neva bhasita hoti, no katta.
an4.101:5.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo neva gajjita hoti, no vassita.
an4.101:5.4: Seyyathapi so, bhikkhave, valahako neva gajjita, no vassita;
an4.101:6.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo gajjita ca hoti vassita ca?
an4.101:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo bhasita ca hoti katta ca.
an4.101:6.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo gajjita ca hoti vassita ca.
an4.101:6.4: Seyyathapi so, bhikkhave, valahako gajjita ca vassita ca;
an4.101:6.6: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaro valahakupama puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmin”ti.
